section.name: Patterns
section.p: JaxMe JS comes with a set of generators for implementing certain patterns:

ul.li: Proxy objects are implementing an interface or mimicking another class by delegating calls to another object.
Multiple inheritance is an application of the proxy pattern.
Typesafe enumerations are classes with a restricted set of instances.
Proxy chains are an implementation of the delegator pattern.
Versioned database objects are basically unmodifiable objects. Updates are actually implemented as copying.
